title: WTB: A Couple of T212-2 1910 Obaks
author: vintagebaseballcardguy

posts.post_title: WTB: A Couple of T212-2 1910 Obaks
posts.post_content: Does anyone have one or two in G-VG condition they'd be willing to part with at a reasonable price?  I am getting interested in this set but would like to have one or two untrimmed raw ones to examine and just get a feel for them.  Most of what I see on ebay are all slabbed BINs.  Thanks.
